entity.entitySummary: This entity stores links to references which represent circumscriptions.
entity.entityDescription: The circumscription table stores a key referring to a unique circumscription and to a reference. Also there is a field for notes. It is understood that there is a tangible circumscription which is basically a paragraph describing an object - in the future this may be stored in its own field.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value corresponding to a unique circumscription.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the REFERENCE table.
attribute.attDefinition: This stores the ID number of a reference to a circumscription.
This is a field for notes about a given circumscription
